platen-columns-entry.title: Column
platen-columns-entry.description: Add a column block containing markdown into a column group. Each column must be nested inside a column group.

fields.name: selection
fields.title: Content: Specify your column's Markdown content here.

fields.name: grow
fields.title: Specify the column's maximum width in the group. Must be an integer.

fields.name: class
fields.title: Class List: Specify any classes to add to the column in a space-separated list.

fields.name: id
fields.title: ID: Specify an ID to add to the column so it's directly linkable.
